Class TestIPC

  • public class TestIPC
extends Object
    Unit tests for IPC.

      • doErrorTest

        private void doErrorTest(Class<? extends LongWritable> clientParamClass,
               Class<? extends LongWritable> serverParamClass,
               Class<? extends LongWritable> serverResponseClass,
               Class<? extends LongWritable> clientResponseClass)
                  throws IOException,
                         InstantiationException,
                         IllegalAccessException
        Generic test case for exceptions thrown at some point in the IPC process.
        Parameters:
        clientParamClass - - client writes this writable for parameter
        serverParamClass - - server reads this writable for parameter
        serverResponseClass - - server writes this writable for response
        clientResponseClass - - client reads this writable for response
        Throws:
        IOException
        InstantiationException
        IllegalAccessException

      • testIOEOnWriteAfterPingClient

        public void testIOEOnWriteAfterPingClient()
                                   throws Exception
        Test case that fails a write, but only after taking enough time that a ping should have been sent. This is a reproducer for a deadlock seen in one iteration of HADOOP-6762.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • testRTEDuringConnectionSetup

        public void testRTEDuringConnectionSetup()
                                  throws IOException
        Test that, if a RuntimeException is thrown after creating a socket but before successfully connecting to the IPC server, that the failure is handled properly. This is a regression test for HADOOP-7428.
        Throws:
        IOException
